TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 1104
TEI.2.document_title: William Kingheloe to Stephen F Austin, 05-30-1825

barker_notes.barker_summary: William Kincheloe to Austin, May 30, 1825. Angry reply to letter from Austin taking him to task for misstatement concerning land.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1104

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*William Kincheloe to Austin, May 30, 1825. Angry reply to letter from Austin taking him to task for misstatement concerning land.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*peach Creek */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="05-30-1825">may the 30 1825*/date_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*Dear Sir i receiv your very insulting letter you inform me you was much astonished to hear of my stating you had made apresent of my land that report is fabricated by some bad person who expects to live by fals hood and swindleing as for my stating to the people that i have stated false hood or un truth respecting my land i shall not i never shall Contradit any statement i have mad and i can assure you sir i never shall abuse you for any friendship you have Conferd on me but as for my saying directly or indirectly that you presented me with land or any thing else is false hood i expect sir that i have said less a bout my land or Deed than any other man in the *location_mentioned*Collony */location_mentioned*the last line of your letter i cant understand and i Conclude wishing you as wish all *person_mentioned*B M [Brother Masons?]*/person_mentioned* that is true repentence and reformation*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Wm Kincheloe*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Col Stephen f Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*N B you will give the *person_mentioned*auther */person_mentioned*of these reports by the first opportunity */p*
*p**person_mentioned*Wm Kincheloe*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Col Stephen f Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
